text: Good Morning, everyone!
We are doing Vlog today.
It's 8 am, and I'm going to Singapore.
I only slept 3 hours last night, I don't know why I always have a lack of sleep when I have a flight.
It looks like quiet, right? But actually there were many people lining up for the Singapore flight since 7:50 am.
The flight is at 10:50 am!
So I come ahead of time.
This is my first Singapore trip.
I'm traveling alone.
I have my Thai friends who is traveling, and I have my Singaporean who is influencer in there too.
I'll meet them too.
I have no idea about Singapore, because I've never been there before.
I'm a bit worried.
Anyway, I got many outfits for this trip, you'll see!
Let's go to Singapore.
(Heading to the Hotel quickly by Grab)
(From the airport to the hotel at Orchard is about$21.80 or 550 baht)
I'm in the Grab now, because I want to save time.
Everything at the immigration office was very slow.
It will take about an hour and a half by bus.
But it only takes 30 minutes using Grab.
So, I'll check in at the hotel quickly. Then I'm going to explore!
Right now, I'm very hungry. I haven't eat anything since yesterday's evening.
And I slept only 3 hours.
Anyway, we're gonna make it! We need to be pretty every day!
This place is very Hi-Tech.
Checking in and get the key at the kiosk,
Face scanning, nice!
(The music is very upbeat in here)
This is the bed room.
(The Premium City View Queen Room is approximately 5,000 baht) This is the bed room.
(The Premium City View Queen Room is approximately 5,000 baht)

I chose this room because they told me that it's a city view,
where is it?
I got it, the city view is in a bathroom.
It's not necessary.
But it's better if it makes the room brighter with the light.
Here we are.
The room is quite lovely, a modern style.
The bed looks nice!
OMG! Great!
(The soul sucking bed) OMG! Great!
(The soul sucking bed)
This is what I need. (The soul sucking bed)
It's adjustable. (The soul sucking bed)
It's adjustable.
Like this.
There it is!

There it is!
The hangers
Transformed!
No, I just changed my cloths.
I put some more make up, because I didn't have any make up in this area.
I'll go out and start exploring now.
But I need the sunscreen before go out!
I only applied on my face and arms,
but because of this outfit, I need to apply it on the body too.
This one is the one I used for the event that I posted on Instagram.
My skin looked very glow!
I didn't apply glitter or anything like that, I only used this one.
I bring only MizuMi's sunscreen for this entire trip.
MizuMi released the body sunscreen, everybody!
I've been trying it, and I love it so much.
because it's serum texture.
Normally, it will be sticky feeling when go out with sunscreen, right?
But this one is not.
This is MizuMi UV Bright Body Serum SPF50+ PA++++.
It's body serum sunscreen.
The texture is like this!
I don't like the sticky feeling after applying the body sunscreen.
This one is not like that, it can be absorb very well, and still remain moisture.
This one doesn't create any white stain on cloths.
This is one of the best point, because some brand leave white stain on cloths.
Everybody will know that we use sunscreen in which area.
Like this.
It's not the tone up sunscreen but I don't know why my skin looked so glow in the picture.
This one is both chemical and physical sunscreen.
It's hybrid.
It delivers highest protection.
The smell is good too.
I'm applying it on my legs.
It treats the skin well.
They claims that it can brighten the skin after 14 days.
Because it contains Kakadu Plum extract.
This extract contains 100 times of Vitamin C more than the orange does.
Another important thing, it is alcohol free.
0% alcohol.
And coral friendly.
It's very gentle, and can be used everyday.
I use it everyday.
Many people always keep asking me about the sunscreen that I use.
I don't really use lotion, but the sunscreen is the must for me.
Anyway, I'm a big fan of MizuMi.
You might see in the previous videos that I ask my manager to send MizuMi's product to Korea.
And once this one released, I'm so excited because I love sunscreen.
And this one is very good.
If you're looking for a sunscreen that comes in a big size,
sunblock effective, absorb and treat the skin well, no white stain,
skin hydrated, glow look, this one is your choice.
If you're interested, please visit MizuMi_Official Facebook page.
Go and grab it! I really like this one.
Let's go!
Hello.
Is it recording now?
It is!
Hello.
Hello, who are you?
Who am I.. I'm her senior.
I have to take her to have a meal, such a hard one.
(He have been in Singapore for 10 days, so I beg him to) I have to take her to have a meal, such a hard one.
(He have been in Singapore for 10 days, so I beg him to)
I'll show you the China Town.
The food is not too pricey in that area.
Normally, food are expensive in Singapore.
Singapore is not a big country.
Like Phuket?
Yes.
(First attempt to the restaurant)
(They take only cash, but I didn't bring it)
(He is in a rush because he got a flight)
I live in Korea for a while, and they don't really use cash.
Everyone, it was messed up earlier.
They don't take credit card.
Normally I don't carry cash.
I got cash but I was in a rush, and I forgot it at the hotel.
We can use credit card in this restaurant, so we are here.
The menu is exact the same one as that restaurant!
Everyone, thses food is only for me. (All of these just for me)
This is fried pork.
It's very big.
I haven't eaten for a day.
Yummy.
Let me try the pork.
So big.
It's good but mostly the breadcrumbs,
(It's delicious but there are too little pork)
(Need some fillers)
(It's chewy, trying hard to bite)
I did my best.
I ate many things, perfectly full now, I can't have any single more bite.
The noodles are the best.
I can't take all of this one, because it's too much breadcrumbs.
This one is okay because it's salty.
This is the restaurant for my meal tonight.
This one.
Its English name is Oriental Cuisine.
We’re at Singapore’s ChinaTown.
It reminds me of Phuket.
The neighborhood here has a lot of Chinese things such as Chinese food.
My sis said it looks like Yaowarat.
I’m so shocked!
I just came out of the elevator and met with this guy.
Hi~
Well, it seems a bit scary for me.
Good morning, everyone ~
You might be curious, like, What? Is that it for yesterday’s vlog?
Actually, it’s day 3 already.
Because yesterday I went to Universal Studio and made it for another vlog.
If anyone wants to keep up with the trip there, you can also watch that one.
Today will be a full course.
My schedule is quite adjustable. Just as much as I can carry on.
Let’s do a Tourist Theme today.
I’ve never been to Singapore before. So, I’ve never seen the Merlion or Gardens by the Bay.
Well, it’s quite late now.
Singapore is not somewhere we need to wake up that early to get ready for a trip.
Unlike in Japan where we had to wake up early for the Sashimi.
I will visit the neighborhood my acquaintance has recommended.
He said that they have a very popular café there.
What is it called?
I can’t pronounce its name properly.
Then I will try Chinese noodles at the shop on the opposite side.
He said it was really delicious.
I’m gonna bring the pretty dress I wore yesterday to change there and take some shots.
All packed in this bag.
Let’s go.
[Just found a kid in the elevator wearing exactly the same shoes as mine.]
We’re soulmates! How cute~ [Just found a kid in the elevator wearing exactly the same shoes as mine.]
[The bus stop is right next to the Yotel. Very convenient.]
Now I’m waiting for the bus. [The bus stop is right next to the Yotel. Very convenient.]
[The bus stop is right next to the Yotel. Very convenient.]
So yesterday, I took the bus to Universal Studios
Oh.
[The bus has arrived] Oh.
[The bus has arrived]
[The bus fare is 40-60 baht here. Just tap your credit card to pay.]
[Didn’t see it coming]
I went to the wrong bus stop!
No. I took the wrong bus. It’s the wrong number!
Let me put myself together.
No, but the map really told me to take the bus No.7 or 77, so I took the No.77 right away.
I’m so worried now.
This is where I’m heading to. The Merlion is nearby, so let’s visit the Merlion first.
I’m gonna skip breakfast. Let’s go.
[The bus has arrived again]
Alright, everyone.
Just now I said we’re going to the Merlion, right?
At first, it seemed not that far from the map. But it turns out that we have to walk for 18 minutes.
And the bus just arrived, so I caught the bus and just got down here at the Esplanade.
This is not the journey of struggle, okay?
I kept missing the chance to grab a meal.
Look!
Mer…Mer…Merli…Merlion!
The building over there is uhm…
I’ll put the name below later.
I don’t know its name.
What a joke!
I just want to have breakfast!  Why must I take the wrong bus?
It is too far to get back and is even too far to go on.
So, the Merlion is the nearest stop.
See, my jeans are loosened right now because I haven’t got a meal.
They have a river over here and a place for people to sit back and relax.
And we’re gonna walk across that bridge to see the Merlion.
On the way, we would see some small shops and people riding bicycles.
I must have taken photos for almost 8 people right now.
I love taking photos for others.
See, everyone. It’s so relaxing!
I really enjoy walking along like this.  Wish our country had more places for chilling out.
Look.
Wow!
The Merlion~
This is what it looks like.
[As expected] This is what it looks like.
[As expected]
[The only partner for my solo traveling is the tripod]
No. Why did I cover the Merlion?
It’s not crowded here, but I can’t tell if I'm in someone else's camera.
Because everybody is taking photos.
The sideways are decorated with flowers.
So pretty.
Isn’t it pretty?
Just now I was using the map and there was a Singapore guy coming to me.
He said Sorry, I saw you walk by and think you are really cute, or something like that.
[Being a solo traveler, you must be aware of speaking to strangers.]
I am a very careful person. [Being a solo traveler, you must be aware of speaking to strangers.]
I never dropped off my belongings and always kept my pace fast. [Being a solo traveler, you must be aware of speaking to strangers.]
I never dropped off my belongings and always kept my pace fast.
If anyone wants to solo travel, don’t talk with strangers too much.
Unless you need them to take you a photo.
But you gotta make sure they won’t snatch your camera away.
I’m waiting for a Grab car.
The bus is coming in the next 30 minutes.
Can’t wait that long.
I’m starving.
My junior had just tried Hainanese Chicken Rice there, so I asked how it was.
And he said it was nice.
So, I’m going to have Hainanese Chicken Rice for the meal.
Alrighty, everyone~
It’s time for the meal.
Here we are at Maxwell Food Centre.
This food center is famous for its food court.  There are plenty of menus.
Chinese food shop.
They have 2 roads to go. There are also some food shops over here.
This is where my junior stopped by.
Thailand!
Taiwan?
Oh, Thailand.
Yeah, I’m Thai.
They said Thai people are beautiful.
Be proud, girls!
Thank you.
Wowwwww.
Let’s eat!
I’m aware that we’re running out of the contents.
Of course, eating is what I’m really good at.
I’m having Hainanese Chicken Rice and Duck Noodle Soup.
Duck Noodle Soup is from that shop.
Now I’ve finished all the dishes.   Kinda thirsty.
It’s not that I’m full already.  Well, the noodles were quite salty.
The duck topping was really delicious, but the noodles were a bit salty and greasy.
Hainanese Chicken Rice was also yummy. Their steamed rice was juicy.
Kinda juicier than how we cooked in Thailand.  But it tastes quite the same.
Let's find some dessert.
Over there is the neighborhood around. Singapore is a neat and clean city.
Quite similar to Phuket, I think.
They have a Chinese vibe.
Let’s stop at this coffee bar.
Exhausted.
They said this one is the best seller.
It’s called Ice Cereal Milk Latte.
Tasty.
Can you take a film photo for me, please?
It’s okay. You just point here.
Look, the cup is so cute and the taste is kinda mild. Not the strong one.
Which is good because I could easily get a headache if I have strong coffee.
Yummy.
I’ve arrived at Marina Barrage already, everyone!
I just got here by Grab right after the coffee
[Singapore’s GrabTaxi service fee is about 200-500 baht.]
Because we can’t waste any more time waiting. [Singapore’s GrabTaxi service fee is about 200-500 baht.]
Because we can’t waste any more time waiting.
The sky is so beautiful today!
When I went to Universal Studios yesterday, it was quite cloudy.
Look at today's sky.  We’re going up there.
Everyone, this place is so fabulous! Oh, my god.
This is on top of The Marina Barrage.
It's field, and many people picnic here.
It's very nice.
You can see everything from here. Over there is Gardens by the Bay.
So nice.
My junior is here already.
Hello, guys.
Introduce yourself a bit.
Hi there, I’m Pleum. That’s it.
Or should I say something more?
Pleum used to study at the faculty of journalism, And he was my junior in the cheerleader team.
Then he left us and graduated from the faculty of engineering at Chulalongkorn University.
For those who’d like to visit here someday,  I suggest you bring the picnic sets.
So at least you’ve got something to do.
There are people rowing boats too!
Row, row, row your boat~
I’ve got my outfit changed already, yeah!
I only prepared this dress for the Garden.
Am I annoying? I’m still carrying this with me.
I'm a bit struggling now.
Fight for life!
Wow. We’re at the Garden now.
This place is very huge!
So gigantic!
It’s this large!
Whoa!
Oh, my god!
They will turn on the lights around here at about 7.45 pm.

Do you want to take a photograph with her? Just a video is okay.
Hi~
So cute. Thank you.
The air is so cool here.
Aw, those cuties.
Plants.
I can smell them.
Those who love flowers and plants should visit here once.
Because, look, they are so beautiful.
Doesn’t it recall the Feel My Rhythm vibe?
Flowers are everywhere.
Those are the flowers, the roses’ varieties.
Very beautiful! I like them.
[Went outside to see the sunset for a while.]
Golden hour in our country comes around 4:30 to 5 pm., right?
In Singapore the sky and sunlight will be really beautiful at 5:30 pm.
And the sun sets at 7 pm.
Wow
Cloud Forest has just turned on its light.
Wow, so beautiful.
It’s so large.
Big.
If you come here by any chance  go up the elevator and walk along on the cloud walk.
It’s a long walk path where you can see the view of the outside and below.
I will show you the whole view.
Yeah, it reminds me of Avatar.
Look at this. Very beautiful.
They’re showing us the lights at 7:45 pm.
I’m in Clarke Quay, right now. To visit my friend.

[I’ve still got plenty of time left.]
Ouch!
[Just playing a concert while waiting for the rain to stop.]
Hello~ This is my last day here.
My flight is at around half past 3. So I’ve got some time left for taking a walk.
My theme for today is the Lady Orchard.
But I can’t bring my brand name bag with me because of the rain.
See, it has just stopped recently.
I was planning to come out earlier but it's raining.
It’s 10 o'clock already. So we're gonna have some brunch
and then we’ll go to the ION Orchard, I guess.
It’s a mall with many luxury brands. Let’s go observe.
Ice Matc… No. My bad.
I just asked for ice matcha, but they have none.
This cup is Ice Mocha with almond milk and is less sweet.
My breakfast is here~
Well, let’s call it brunch because it’s nearly 11 now.
They’re poached eggs and there is avocado, toast, pomegranate
That is a mushroom, I guess.
And there is some salad.
[The menus will be varied according to the timetable here.]
[This is so delicious. I could have cried.]
[You must try once]
That was very delicious, everyone.
Very, very, very delicious.
The taste of avocado toast was quite predictable, right?
It’s Just a toast with avocado topping.
But that one was very delicious.
I could say it was the most delicious avocado toast I’ve ever eaten in my life.
I’ve just walked around the Orchard today and spotted many people not wearing a mask.
So I’ve just rechecked and found that they’re allowed to remove their mask outdoors since March.
But most people are still wearing them.
Well, today is Saturday, so it’s quite crowded.
And over there is the ION Orchard Mall.
Wow.
Feels like I’m at the Central Embassy.
All luxury brands are gathered here.
So, the Orchard is just like this.
The country is neat and clean.
Everywhere I go is just easy on my eyes and ears.
Well, there are places that are not so easy for my ears because they are constructing.
But what I fancy about them are their charming trees and flowers.
Look at the sidewalks.
How can their flowers grow so well?
So pretty.
[Took a little shot.]
I’m on the Grab right now.
Well, I called Grab just now. And, you know, I had left my luggage at the hotel.
But the staff couldn’t find my luggage at the moment Grab arrived.
So, I ended up being late.
And if you are later than the time set in the app, you will be charged 3 dollars.
Well, I’ve got charged 3 dollars.
But I’m in a hurry to the airport.
I’ll show you the atmosphere inside the Changi airport.
There are so many shops.
This airport has also won the best world airport award previously.
They have the luxury brands, the cafés, and the minimarts.
It’s very large.
Recently, I’ve checked-in by using the kiosk device.
It is the auto self-check-in process which can print us both the boarding pass and baggage tag.
Then we will go to the baggage drop to leave our luggage being loaded.
So, we can do all these on our own.
By putting the tag on our bags and sending them in.
Those who are taking return flights should spare your time in advance.
As for me, I’ve got 3 hours to spare.
When I arrived, it wasn't very crowded at the checkpoint.
Just a little bit of this and that and I got in quickly.
I just saw that the row is quite long already.
But bag scanning might need to be done at the gate.
Very yummy
Okay, I'm going to wrap things up here.
Everybody told me that 3 days in Singapore is adequate, so enough,
but it’s not for my case.
Even my Singaporean friend said it’s really not enough.
During these 3-4 days you might have to tighten your schedule up which could be exhausting.
But it’s understandable, some may not want to spend time here too long because the hotel cost is expensive.
But if you want to wander around Singapore freely, I think 5 days is cool.
There are a lot of cafés and so on
Sentosa also has many activities to do
Or anyone who enjoys the nightlife, there are so many pubs and bars.
Just come for once and visit all the highlights.
I also regret missing many of them too.
I only went to one café, that’s all. I didn’t plan it properly
Oh, you know I’ve met all my acquaintances here, right?
It turned out no one had a plan. They really had no idea.
I asked them for the next day's trip. And they were uncertain.
So, I think Singapore is a good choice for someone who desires to chill out.
I had a lot of fun on this trip, but it was so exhausting.
Especially, at Garden by the Bay I was unexpectedly exhausted.
I walked a lot that day.
In such a developed country, there would be a lot of spaces for us to roam.
Well, I hope you enjoy my not-quite-a-solo-travel vlog.
I didn’t even book an appointment, but they’re all here in Singapore.
There were not so many highlights for you to track the trails,
But I wanted to show you my first experience traveling in Singapore alone.
Normally, when I went on my solo travel, it would be the country I have been to.
I’ve never ever been here before, still I have the urge to come.
If you enjoy this video, please like and leave some comments below.
Just let me know if you like any part in this clip.
Because there are many funny moments.
Oh, I’ll later note down all my expenses for the trip below.
I can barely remember things right now.
You can see them in the description box.
Okay, see you guys next time.
Bye bye~
